sentence.Network_en: She bade farewell to her son.
I bade farewell to all the friends I had made in Paris.
sentence.Network_cn: 我告别了我在巴黎结交的所有朋友。

sentence.Network_en: He bade his wife farewell and set out on his journey.
sentence.Network_cn: 他辞别了妻子便启程了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from the imperative of fare + the adverb well

encyclopedia.content: 伴都美子演唱歌曲 《farewell》是伴都美子2006年03月29日发行的同名个人专辑《farewell》中的第一首歌，也是主打单曲。日语歌词 远ざかる あなたの声が 震える私の心を 壊してゆく 伤つけてゆく 歪んだ 二人の距离が in my heart そっと手を差し出して hold me tight 抱きしめてほしいの don't say good-bye don't say good-bye ひとりの夜 don't say good-bye don't say good-bye 戻せない时间 don't say good-bye don't say goo

entry.def: Farewell means the same as goodbye .

means.word_mean: 1. an acknowledgment or expression of goodwill at parting
